testsuite.system-out:
Feature: Post a Blog Entry In order to show the rest of the world how smart I am As a Blogger I want to be able to post a blog entry
--Output from New Blog Post-- Scenario: New Blog Post # creating_blog_entries.feature:6 Given I am logged in as a blogger When I publish a new blog post Then I am notified that the blog post was successfully added And the newly added blog post is at the top of the recent posts list
